text:
The following ANT code run in a directory with no "*.a" files produces a crash:

<project default="build" >
  <target name="build">
    <dependset>
      <srcfileset dir="." >
        <include name="*.a"/>
      </srcfileset>
      <targetfileset dir=".">
        <include name="*.b"/>
      </targetfileset>
    </dependset>
  </target>
</project>

Output:

Buildfile: build.xml

build:

BUILD FAILED

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.DependSet.execute(DependSet.java:240)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:217)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:164)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:182)

        at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(Main.java:176)
